message: Starting review of Schema & Core Implementation phase deliverables
Examining task findings and agent deliverables to verify implementation
Verifying state_db integration in real_mcp_server.py and checking dashboard API migration

Review completed. Verdict: needs_revision. Found critical SQLite migration bug preventing database initialization. Core integration exists but non-functional due to schema errors.
